    • Method Detail

      • startTick

        public void startTick()
        Start the ticker.

      • stopTick

        public boolean stopTick()
        Have the ticker stop ticking. This method will suspend until the ticker thread is finished
        Returns:
        Returns true if the ticker was stopped with no errors. Returns false if the ticker was stopped with an InterruptedException error.

      • getTicks

        public final ArrayList<com.ep.ggs.system.ticker.Ticker.TickData> getTicks()
        Get an ArrayList of ticks that are ticking.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of tick objects

      • addTick

        Add a Tick object to the ticker.
        Parameters:
        t - The tick object to add

      • removeTick

        public void removeTick(Tick t)
        Remove a Tick object from the ticker
        Parameters:
        t - The tick object to remove
